title: The Indecisive Mind of Kelly Richardson
description: Kelly Richardson, a young, ambitious, enthusiastic entrepreneur embarks on a roller coaster journey which brings her to Palo Alto, California where she gets caught up in a whirlwind romance. Now she has to choose between the alluring Mark Grabowski, or the perfect preppy Brian from Altiva, or the laid back Aaron. As her love life takes twists and turns, follow Kelly on a path to self-discovery!
author: S. Kay
